channel.title: CVE Feed for Hospira -- LifeCare PCA Infusion System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hospira -- LifeCare PCA Infusion System

item.title: CVE-2015-1012|2024-08-06T04:26:11.620Z -- hospira -- lifecare%20pca%20infusion%20system
item.description: Wireless keys are stored in plain text on version 5 of the Hospira LifeCare PCA Infusion System. According to Hospira, version 3 of the LifeCare PCA Infusion System is not indicated for wireless use, is not shipped with wireless capabilities, and should not be modified to be used in a wireless capacity in a clinical setting. Hospira has developed a new version of the PCS Infusion System, version 7.0 that addresses the identified vulnerabilities. Version 7.0 has Port 20/FTP and Port 23/TELNET closed by default to prevent unauthorized access.
